welcome.messageWelcome:
This setup wizard guides you through the most important settings and gives you valuable tips for configuration.
Do you want to use your shop in a different language and reach customers in other countries? Then you can simply install the desired language packs here.

demodata.messageDemodata:
Optionally use the possibility and equip your shop with demo data.

Please note: The demo data is for testing purposes only. You should not use them in a productive environment.
demodata.loadingMessage:
Installing demo data plugin
This may take a while...

paypal-info.headline: Now pre-integrated in Shopware with even easier and faster activation of the most popular payment methods*
paypal-info.disclaimer-two: 2 subject to a positive risk assessment by PayPal

paypal-install.loadingMessage:
Installing PayPal plugin
This my take a while...

recommended-plugins.headline: Our recommendations
recommended-plugins.message: Here you will find a selection of useful extensions for your shop. First select a region that is relevant for you. Then you can browse through different categories.

shopware-account.headline: Shopware Account
shopware-account.message:
Sign up now with your Shopware ID. This will give you access to your purchased plugins and licenses.

With your Shopware ID you can log into other Shopware platforms such as the Community Store, the forum or your personal Shopware account.
shopware-account.register-account-text: You don't have a Shopware ID yet? Then register directly

shopware-domain.headline: Verify your domain
shopware-domain.message: With which domain do you want to link this shop? Select the appropriate domain or create a new one.

finish.loadingMessage:
Restarting Application
This may take a while...
